humanum_full_description_en:
From "申", "昜" sound. " Chang " is the differentiated word "畼". In the official script stage, the vertical pen of " Tian " may be extended to " Shen ", and then " Chang " means unobstructed " Chang ". "Shuowen": "Wen, no birth. Congtian, Mingsheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Today's Changyu is the word for Libian."

The original meaning of " chang " is accessibility and reach. "Jade articles. Shen Bu: "Chang, Da Ye, Tong Ye." Such as "Zhou Yi. "Kun": "Beauty is in the four branches, and it comes from the career, and the beauty is the most." Kong Yingdashu: "If there is beauty in the middle, it must be smooth outside." "Han Feizi. Shuo Lin: "Xi Si Mi sees Tian Chengzi, Tian Chengzi and the stage look around. Three sides are smooth, looking south, Xi Zi's family is covered by the tree."

" Chang " means stretch and expression. "anthology. Song Yu's "Goddess Fu": "You can't be smooth if you have a relationship with Xi'en Ge." Li Shan's note: "Chang, Shen Ye. It is not possible to express your own wishes." "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Zhang Biao": "As for the recommendation of literary works, Ni Heng is full of spirit; the post-master of Kong Ming's remarks is full of ambitions and the literary is smooth; although he is brilliant and different, he also expresses the English."

" Chang " means exuberant. Such as "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 1": "When Yao was the time, the world was still not peaceful, the floods were flooding the world, the vegetation was lush, the animals reproduced, the grains were not planted, the animals were pressing, and the way of the traces of the hoofs and birds was passed to China." Heng. "Tao Xu": "The life of a case of grass and trees, the one who is shaken is hurt and not smooth; the guidance of man shakes the body, why can't live but die?"

" Chang " means comfort and joy. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Zeyang": "The old country and the old capital, the hope is smooth." Lu Deming explained: "Changran, happy appearance." Tang Dynasty Bai Xingjian "Three Dreams": "It's too late. The wine matches the reward, and it's very joyful."

" Chang " means to have fun. For example, Wang Xizhi of the Eastern Jin Dynasty "Preface to the Collection of Orchid Pavilion": "Although there is no prosperity of the silk bamboo orchestra, one chant and one chant are enough to express the secret feelings." Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty, "Yu Shi Ming Yan. "Shan Fulang Quanzhou Couple": "Today's meeting, there will be no other guests, don't stick to the etiquette, you should drink openly, and make sure you have fun."

" Chang " and "鬯" means tulip grass, and also refers to the fragrant wine used in ancient sacrifices, made from tulips and black millet. Such as "The Great Dai Li Ji. "Xia Xiaozheng": "Chang Ye, a sacrifice for the whole year." Kong Guangsen added: "Chang, Yu Yan Ye." "Lun Heng. "Different Vulence": "Fuchang grass can be brewed, and those who enjoy the fragrance and fragrance will be sacrificed and poured into the gods."

" Smooth " but also for the adverbs of degree, equivalent to " very ", " very ." For example, the fourth fold of the first book of "The Western Chamber" by Wang Shifu of the Yuan Dynasty: "Chang annoyed! The sound of clanging and clanging clouds." Wang Jisi's proofread: "Chang, extremely meaning." Ming Dynasty Meng Chengshun's "Peach Blossom Face" first published "Along the way, the weather is neither warm nor cold, half a village, half a country house, and enjoy the scenery!"
humanum_short_description_en: From "申", "昜" sound. The original meaning is Tong and Da.
humanum_full_description:
從「申」，「昜」聲。「暢」是「畼」分化字。隸書階段，「田」的豎筆或延伸為「申」，後便以「暢」表示通暢的「暢」。《說文》：「畼，不生也。从田，昜聲。」段玉裁注：「今之暢葢卽此字之隷變。」

　　「暢」的本義是通、達。《玉篇．申部》：「暢，達也，通也。」如《周易．坤》：「美在其中而暢於四支，發於事業，美之至也。」孔穎達疏：「有美在於中，必通暢於外。」《韓非子．說林》：「隰斯彌見田成子，田成子與登臺四望。三面皆暢，南望，隰子家之樹蔽之。」

　　「暢」引申表示舒展、表達。《文選．宋玉〈神女賦〉》：「交希恩踈，不可盡暢。」李善注：「暢，申也。未可申暢己意也。」《文心雕龍．章表》：「至於文舉之薦禰衡，氣揚采飛；孔明之辭後主，志盡文暢；雖華實異旨，並表之英也。」

　　「暢」表示旺盛。如《孟子．滕文公上》：「當堯之時，天下猶未平，洪水橫流，氾濫於天下，草木暢茂，禽獸繁殖，五穀不登，禽獸偪人，獸蹄鳥迹之道交於中國。」《論衡．道虛》：「案草木之生，動搖者傷而不暢；人之導引動搖形體者，何故壽而不死？」

　　「暢」表示舒暢、歡快。如《莊子．則陽》：「舊國舊都，望之暢然。」陸德明釋文：「暢然，喜悅貌。」唐代白行簡〈三夢記〉：「日已晚，同詣杓直修行里第，命酒對酬，甚歡暢。」

　　「暢」表示盡情。如東晉王羲之〈蘭亭集序〉：「雖無絲竹管弦之盛，一觴一詠，亦足以暢敘幽情。」明代馮夢龍《喻世明言．單符郎全州佳偶》：「今日之會，並無他客，勿拘禮法，當開懷暢飲，務取盡懽。」

　　「暢」通「鬯」，表示鬱金香草，又指古代祭祀用的香酒，以鬱金香和黑黍釀成。如《大戴禮記．夏小正》：「暢也者，終歲之用祭也。」孔廣森補注：「暢，鬱鬯也。」《論衡．異虛》：「夫暢草可以熾釀，芬香暢達者，將祭，灌暢降神。」

　　「暢」還可作程度副詞，相當於「甚」、「極」。如元代王實甫《西廂記》第一本第四摺：「暢懊惱！響鐺鐺雲板敲。」王季思校注：「暢，極甚之意。」明代孟稱舜《桃花人面》第一齣：「一路行來，正是不暖不寒天氣，半村半郭人家，暢好風景也呵！」
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
暢 (Simplified: 畅)
Pinyin: chàng
English Definition: free; unimpeded; smooth; at ease; free from worry; fluent
Total strokes: 14; Radical: 日
Pictophonetic: 昜 indicates the sound; 申 (open) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 申 [ shēn ] to report; to extend; to explain; to declare
    • 昜 [ yáng ] bright, glorious; to expand, to open up
Example Words:
暢通 [ chàng tōng ]: unimpeded; free-flowing; straight path; unclogged; move without obstruction
暢銷 [ chàng xiāo ]: to sell well; best seller; chart-topping
暢談 [ chàng tán ]: to talk freely; to discuss without inhibition
More: 暢* | *暢 | *暢*

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 申 [ shēn ] to report; to extend; to explain; to declare
    • 昜 [ yáng ] bright, glorious; to expand, to open up

②痛快，盡情地：暢快。暢談。暢遊(ａ．暢快地遊覽：b．暢快地游泳)。歡暢。舒暢。暢所欲言。
③姓氏。

Chinese: The money loving monkey spends part of everyday with his piggy bank making sure it's nice and smooth.  
Meaning: smooth
Hanzi: 畅
Story: The monkey and piglet might be very different animals but they are both still cute and smooth enough to pet.
Kind: traditional

Liushutong characters (8)

暢字的基本解释

暢
chàng
见“畅”。

暢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chàng］
［《廣韻》丑亮切，去漾，徹。］
“畅1”的繁体字。
(1)通畅；通达。
(2)舒展；表达。
(3)舒畅；欢快。
(4)旺盛。
(5)充，充实。参见“暢月”。
(6)长。与“短”相对。参见“暢轂”。
(7)尽情；尽兴。
(8)副词。表示程度。相当于“甚”、“极”。
(9)琴曲名。
(10)通“鬯”。郁金香草。亦指用它搀和黑黍酿造的香酒，古代多用以祭祀。
(11)通“觴”。斟酒自饮。
(12)姓。汉有畅曾；唐有畅璀。参阅《通志·氏族五》。

暢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暢； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页498第49
【廣韻】【集韻】?丑亮切，音唱。通暢。又達也。【易·坤卦】美在其中而暢於四支。【疏】有美在中，必通暢於外。【尙書序】約文申義，敷暢厥旨。　又【禮·月令】命之曰暢月。【註】暢，充也。　又【類篇】長也。　又琴曲。【風俗通】命其曲曰暢。暢者，言其道之美暢。　又姓。【陳留·風俗傳】暢氏出齊。唐有暢當。　【集韻】通作鬯。

暢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
暢字的起名意思

暂无。

smooth
Basic explanation of words
smooth
chàng
See "Chang".
smooth
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chàng］
["Guangyun" is ugly and brightly cut, go to the water, and thoroughly. ]
Traditional characters for "畅1".
(1) Unobstructed; accessible.
(2) Stretch; express.
(3) Comfortable; cheerful.
(4) Exuberant.
(5) Full and substantial. See "Changyue".
(6) Long. Contrast with "short". See "Chang Hub".
(7) Have fun; have fun.
(8) Adverbs. Indicates the degree. Equivalent to "very" and "extremely".
(9) The name of the piano.
(10) Through "鬯". Tulip grass. It also refers to the fragrant wine made with it and black millet, which was mostly used for sacrifices in ancient times.
(11) Through "Goblin". Pour wine for self-drinking.
(12) Last name. Han has Chang Zeng; Tang has Chang Cui. See "Tongzhi·Clan Five".

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ugly bright cut, singing. unobstructed. It's up too. 【Yi·Kun Gua】The beauty is in it, but it is smooth in the four branches.
